Initial commit: Production IIS deployment with full application

This commit includes the complete JubileeVerse application configured for production deployment on Windows Server with IIS/IISNode.

Production Configuration:

- Custom rate limiting for IIS environment
- AppError-based error handling with proper status codes
- Production environment detection
- Security middleware \(Helmet, rate limiting\)

Documentation:

- PRODUCTION_SETUP.md - Docker/standalone deployment
